9d092895-9abd-45f2-a870-8a6dd782e233.description: Completion of IGNITE leadership program for first line manager. The program is organized over 10 weeks of active learning divided into modules covering the following topics: getting things done through others, communication, self-management, emotional intelligence, feedback, ABB value and strategy, prioritization, time management, motivation, goal setting, performance management, workload management, team development, delegation, managing conflict, leading diverse and hybrid team.
9d092895-9abd-45f2-a870-8a6dd782e233.name: IGNITE

issuer.summary: issued by ABB Asea Brown Boveri Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the learning course including attendance at least 95% of live sessions and active participation throughout the program, execution of the weekly activities and engagement in collaborative learning, completion of reflection journal, submission of all evaluation forms and completion of all assignment and implementation plans.

45cc2206-57bf-4fd9-b8cd-3aae206e24ff.description: Earners of the ABB Collaborative Leader badge have attended a minimum of 60% of the events with inspirational ABB and external speakers, organized in 2022. 26b778cc-b5de-492d-a9f0-26659c68bc4c.description: Earners of the ABB LGBTQ+ Champion badge have attended a minimum number of the events during 2022 Pride month, learning about the business case for LGBTQ+ inclusion, listening to coming out stories, understanding how to be inclusive in communication, and how to leverage storytelling to boost an inclusion culture. They have been active participants and role models of LGBTQ+ inclusion in the company.

42e7fa8f-1e7b-487b-b54c-ba4c1bbd2034.description: Earners of this badge are certified to deliver the four-hour ABB Greener in Motion workshop. The workshop aims to: raise awareness of the causes, implications, and urgency of climate change, through an innovative card game called Climate Fresk, build a joint understanding of ABB’s Sustainability Strategy 2030, and discuss risks, opportunities, and solutions for the local Motion business and operations related to sustainability, enable to start leveraging sustainability with customers.
42e7fa8f-1e7b-487b-b54c-ba4c1bbd2034.name: ABB Greener in Motion Facilitator

issuer.summary: issued by ABB Asea Brown Boveri Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the train-the-trainer Greener in Motion workshop, enabling delivery in line with ABB’s Sustainability Strategy 2030
